title: Bug 34428[Motif] Tree and Table views not getting proper selection
description: Bug 34428[Motif] Tree and Table views not getting proper selection
OB: Thecontext menu will contain items appropriate to the first item selected.Noticed this behavior in CVS Repositories view, Navigator view, PackageExplorer, Task List.
SR: To reproduce: (example)1. Open a view containing a tree or table.2. Select an item by left clicking it once.3. Right click (and hold) a different item to bring up a context menu.
